about_the_game:
“Chronicles” are packs of themed levels with a self-contained story told throughout, and are unlocked after completing the first 6 levels of the main campaign.

In the northern region of the Outlands, across its icy valleys and jagged peaks, five clans of vicious mountain folk live in constant rivalry. When a sudden rise in water level forces them to start anew in the upper regions of the mountains, they will have to adopt more sustainable habits in order to survive.

“Flood and Fire” is the second DLC for Outlanders, in which we follow the story of five clan leaders, as they put their differences aside to help each other while discovering the truth behind the flood.

In addition to the 6-level campaign, this DLC contains new customization options for Sandbox mode.
